#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	long long n,i,c,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	long long a[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
	sort(a,a+n);
	c = 1;
	ans = 0;
	for(i=0;i<n-1;i++) {
		if(a[i] == a[i+1])
		c++;
		else {
			ans += (c * (c-1))/2;
			c = 1;
		}
	}
	ans += (c * (c-1))/2;
	ans = (n *(n-1))/2 - ans;
	printf("%lld\n",ans);
	return 0;
}
